detail_desc: Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cotton jersey dress with a short-sleeved top layer in lace, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.

Long trenchcoat in woven fabric with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets with a button, and a single back vent. Unlined.
Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and a fake fly with buttons.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce with broderie anglaise at the top, and an elasticated seam under the bust.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a deep V-neck and short puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with slits in the sides. Partly lined in jersey.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a reversible-sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 1½-4Y), and a rounded hem.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Top with short puff sleeves and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in a wide rib knit with an elasticated waist and flared hems.
Round metal earrings with butterfly-shaped decorations. Diameter 3 cm.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped sparkly stone button at the top.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt jacket in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Two chest pockets, one open and one with a flap and button, and two patch front pockets, one with a small fabric appliqué. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Suede gloves. Lined.
Swim shorts in seersucker containing some cotton. Elasticated, drawstring waist, a fake fly and soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Wide Alice band in grained imitation leather.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with an appliqué on the front. Roll-edge neckline, a button on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and side and back pockets.
Gloves in soft leather with a wool-blend lining.
Mesh shopper with imitation leather details, and two handles and a zip at the top. Unlined. Size 17x34x36 cm.
Long dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with shoulder straps that cross at the back and a slit in one side.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with worn details. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist and zip fly with a button. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front, elastic strap over the foot and grosgrain trim around the top. Satin insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Lined, push-up triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Fully-fashioned fabric trainers with an imitation leather heel cap, lightly padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.

prod_name: CE Cote d azur dress v6
detail_desc: CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short, fitted, one-shoulder dress in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Double-layered, overdimensioned, sturdy, voluminous flounces at the top, over one shoulder and on the skirt. Concealed zip in one side. Chiffon lining made from recycled polyester.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps.

Suit trousers in a slub-weave cotton blend with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Earrings with sparkly stones and beads. Length 5.5 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy crinkled weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, buttons down the front and rounded hem. Unlined.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fine-knit cotton jumper with long, rib-knit raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.

Blouse and a pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Sleeveless, crinkled blouse with a decorative frill at the top and buttons down the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist, decorative bow, fake pockets and elasticated hems.
High-waisted, stretch twill trousers in a viscose blend with a sheen. Zip fly with a button and slim legs.
Short, straight-cut lace dress with a round neck, opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, padded shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.

Set with a top and trousers in patterned cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Jersey trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft and ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort.
Sports top in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined hood with a collar and elasticated drawstring. Discreet kangaroo pocket and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Fitted shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour trim. High waist with covered elastication and rounded hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, overlocked edges and ties with metal decorations.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a round, deep neckline.
Platform trainers with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 5 cm.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and wide elastication at the hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with concealed adjustable elastication at the waist, a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cropped top in airy slub jersey. Deep V-neck with decorative buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Narrow elastication and a tie detail at the hem.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Dress in soft lace with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with flounces at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Fine-knit gloves.
Two-strand necklace of metal chains in different designs, one with a chain pendant at the bottom. Adjustable length, 43-51 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey, one ribbed and one patterned. Press-stud on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar, buttons at the top and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping.
Long-sleeved base layer top in soft wool jersey. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, printed jersey with a round neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fitted blouse in an airy cotton weave with a sweetheart neckline, gathers at the front and short puff sleeves with elastication around the shoulders and hems.
Short, chunky, metal anchor chain necklace. Adjustable length 45-52 cm.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Suit shorts in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and legs with creases.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a grandad collar, gathered yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Seam at the hips and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in softly draping, jacquard-weave viscose with a deep V-neck front and back and a cut-out section with wide ties at the back. Butterfly sleeves, a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
